    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean changeTenant​(Date startDate, Person p, double price)
      Checks if the apartment's tenant can be replaced and update apartment attributes accordingly ( if the tenant is younger, the rental end date ends up to 90 days after the new rental start date and the new price is at least the current rental's price)
      int daysLeft​(Date d)
      Computes the number of days left between a given date and the end of rental date.
      boolean equals​(Apartment other)
      Checks if the current and other apartments are equal by all the apartment attributes
      void extendRentalPeriod​(int years)
      Extends the rental period by additional years(only if the years value is positive)
      double getArea()
      Gets the area of the apartment
      int getNoOfRooms()
      Gets the number of rooms the apartment has
      double getPrice()
      Gets the price of the apartment
      Date getRentalEndDate()
      Gets the rental end date
      Date getRentalStartDate()
      Gets the rental start date
      Person getTenant()
      Gets the tenant renting the apartment
      void setArea​(double area)
      Sets the apartment's area (only if the new value is positive)
      void setNoOfRooms​(int num)
      Sets the apartment's number of rooms (only if the new value is positive)
      void setPrice​(double price)
      Sets the apartment's price (only if the new value is positive)
      void setRentalEndDate​(Date d)
      Sets the apartment's rental end date (only if the new rental end date is after the current rental start date)
      void setRentalStartDate​(Date d)
      Sets the apartment's rental start date (only if the new rental start date is before the current rental end date)
      void setTenant​(Person p)
      Sets the apartment's tenant
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String that represents this Apartment

        public Apartment​(int noOfRooms,
                 double area,
                 double price,
                 Person p,
                 int startDay,
                 int startMonth,
                 int startYear,
                 int endDay,
                 int endMonth,
                 int endYear)
        Apartment Constructor
        Parameters:
        noOfRooms - the number of rooms the apartment has
        area - the apartment's area
        price - monthly price to rent the apartment
        p - the person renting the apartment
        startDay - starting day of apartment rental
        startMonth - starting month of apartment rental
        startYear - starting year of apartment rental
        endDay - last day of apartment rental
        endMonth - last month of apartment rental
        endYear - last year of apartment rental

      • daysLeft

        public int daysLeft​(Date d)
        Computes the number of days left between a given date and the end of rental date. If the given date comes after the end of rental date, returns -1.
        Parameters:
        d - a date object
        Returns:
        the number of days left between a given date and the end of rental date

      • changeTenant

        public boolean changeTenant​(Date startDate,
                            Person p,
                            double price)
        Checks if the apartment's tenant can be replaced and update apartment attributes accordingly ( if the tenant is younger, the rental end date ends up to 90 days after the new rental start date and the new price is at least the current rental's price)
        Parameters:
        startDate - a new rental start date
        p - a new tenant
        price - a new price
        Returns:
        true if the tenant has been changed
